### Training RMSE

```{r}
set.seed(100)
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)

ridge_fit <- readRDS("ridge.rds")
mars_fit <- readRDS("mars.rds")
gam_fit <- readRDS("gam_fit.rds")
lasso_fit <- readRDS("lasso.rds")
pcr_fit <- readRDS("pcr.rds")

res <- resamples(list(
  ridge = ridge_fit,
  lasso = lasso_fit,
  MARS = mars_fit
  ))

res2 <- resamples(list(
  GAM = gam_fit,
  pcr = pcr_fit))



p1 <- ggplot(res, metric = "RMSE") +
  theme_minimal()

p2 <- ggplot(res2, metric = "RMSE") +
  theme_minimal()

library(patchwork)

p1 / p2

```
